title: Gaseous Form
content:
Gaseous Form Level 3 Transmutation Spell Transform yourself or an ally into a tiny gas cloud. It can't fall, and fits through small openings. It is very hard to damage. The cloud has Advantage on Constitution, Dexterity, and Strength Saving Throws. Until Long Rest While transformed, the target won't be able to attack, cast spells, or talk. Gaseous Form is a Spell in Baldur's Gate 3. Gaseous Form is a Lvl 3 Spell from the Transmutation school. Spells can be used for dealing damage to Enemies, inflict Status Ailments, buff Characters or interact with the environment.

Gaseous Form Information

Description: Transform yourself or an ally into a tiny gas cloud. It can't fall, and fits through small openings. It is very hard to damage. The cloud has Advantage on Constitution, Dexterity, and Strength Saving Throws. While transformed, the target won't be able to attack, cast spells, or talk. Level: Lvl 3 spell School: Transmutation School Casting Time: Action Range: Melee Requires Concentration: Yes Saving Throw: None

How to Acquire Gaseous Form

Gaseous Form can be acquired by the following classes: Sorcerer, Warlock, Wizard, Circle of the Spores, Circle of the Land: Underdark , Swarmkeeper Gaseous Form can be cast by using the following Items: ???

Sorcerer, Warlock, Wizard, Circle of the Spores, Circle of the Land: Underdark , Swarmkeeper

Gaseous Form Tips & Notes

Gaseous form is the ultimate scouting spell. It can be used to traverse vertical terrain obstacles like Grant Flight, to access narrow passages into areas you would otherwise not be able to enter like Disguise Self, and also mitigate damage from traps.
